entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Ear Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:46 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -16.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ear Falls 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Temperature: -16.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 59 %
Wind Chill: -24
Dewpoint: -22.7°C
Wind: SW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. A few flurries beginning this evening and ending overnight then 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Otherwise sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 47 in the morning and minus 37 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 37 in the evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
